General.Name: Leyand International Tbk
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PT Leyand International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation and sale of electricity in Indonesia. The company operates 3 power plants, including diesel power plant Sicanang and diesel power plant Siantan, and a gas power plant. It also rents gensets; and constructs power plants. The company was formerly known as PT Lapindo International Tbk and changed its name to PT Leyand International Tbk in 2007. PT Leyand International Tbk was founded in 1990 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
